name: SupaDupa
tag_list: ecommerce-software-for-creative-minds, boutique-ecommerce, online-store, supadupa, online-store-builder, sell-online, shopping-cart-solution, start-online-store
overview:
SupaDupa is the first boutique e-commerce solution for CREATIVE MINDS.

In just a few minutes and without any technical knowledge, this new revolutionary platform allows anyone with an entrepreneurial spirit to create agency quality, classically crafted boutique stores. SupaDupa creates for its clients on-line boutique, customised with their very own domain name, logo and banner sideshows to match the brand it represents.

Online web-stores of all shapes and sizes run on SupaDupa’s Ã¼ber simple platform.
